snippet: The authorities said they had arrested nine people in the bombings in a border town near Syria, as the government moved to keep the attacks from inflaming tensions.
abstract: Memo from Reyhanli; Turkish officials say they have arrested nine people accused of carrying out twin bombings in town of Reyhanli, near Syrian border, as investigation moves at clip that underscores pressure on government to contain fallout from attacks.

byline.original: By KAREEM FAHIM and SEBNEM ARSU

lead_paragraph: The authorities said they had arrested nine people in the bombings in a border town near Syria, as the government moved to keep the attacks from inflaming tensions.

headline.seo: Turkish Officials Appeal for Calm in Wake of Twin Bombings
headline.main: Arrests and Calls for Calm in Turkey
headline.print_headline: Arrests And Calls For Calm In Turkey

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
